amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of the Treasury to notify Congress whether it is able to pay only principal and interest on the national debt, as opposed to other obligations, in the event that the debt limit is reached.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part A of House Report 114-420 to require the Secretary of the Treasury to notify Congress whether it is able to pay only principal and interest on the national debt, as opposed to other obligations, in the event that the debt limit is reached.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 176 (Roll no. 72).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 176 (Roll no. 72).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Duffy.
